pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION and Russ Barlow
pluginstrument.description:
CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET FUEL SELECTOR
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION and Russ Barlow https://simstrumentation.com
Fuel selector lever for the Vision Jet by FlightFX
Version info: - **v1.1** - 2022-12- - Graphics update - Added backlighting - **v1.0** - 2022-12-11 - Original release
NOTES: - Made for the FlightFX Vision Jet. Will not work with other MSFS aircraft.
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
ATTRIBUTION: -Based on code and graphics from Russ Barlow. Used with permission. -Sharing or re-use of any code or assets is not permitted without credit to the original authors.
